      • setUp

public void setUp()

      • testLoginUser_ValidCredentials

        @Test
public void testLoginUser_ValidCredentials()
        Tests the loginUser method with valid credentials

      • testLoginUser_InvalidCredentials

        @Test
public void testLoginUser_InvalidCredentials()
        Tests the loginUser method with invalid credentials

      • testRegisterUser

        @Test
public void testRegisterUser()
        Tests the registerUser method with a valid user. Verifies that the user is saved to the database and that the response status is 201 Created and the response entity is the saved user.

      • testRegisterUser_InvalidCredentials

        @Test
public void testRegisterUser_InvalidCredentials()
        Tests the registerUser method with invalid user credentials. Verifies that the response status is 400 Bad Request and the response entity contains the appropriate error message, depending on which of the required fields (login, password, email) is missing.

      • testRequestPasswordReset_EmailIsRequired

        @Test
public void testRequestPasswordReset_EmailIsRequired()
        Tests the requestPasswordReset method with an empty email

      • testRequestPasswordReset_UserNotFound

        @Test
public void testRequestPasswordReset_UserNotFound()
        Tests the requestPasswordReset method with a non-existent user

      • testRequestPasswordReset_Success

        @Test
public void testRequestPasswordReset_Success()
        Tests the requestPasswordReset method with a valid user
